(Amended by Ord. 403-86, App. 10/3/86; Ord. 379-90, App. 11/21/90; Ord. 298-97, App. 7/25/97)
SEC. 10.158-1.  RESERVED.
Editor's Note:     Ord. 249-07 repealed former Sec. 10.158-1, which pertained to Cash Revolving Funds – Purchasing Department. 
(Added by Ord. 439-96, App. 11/8/96; amended by Ord. 156-99, File No. 990743, App. 6/2/99; repealed by Ord. 249-07, File No. 071329, App. 11/7/2007)
